entry.data:
CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW THIS EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF FLURRIES AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 20 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS AROUND 30

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
